OUTPUT: ['This age group can face unique health challenges that require specific care and attention:', 'Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) – A common condition leading to vision loss in older individuals.', 'Osteoporosis – A disease where bones become brittle due to low bone mass, which can lead to fractures.', 'Arthritis – Inflammations of the joints that are more prevalent with age and cause pain and stiffness.', 'Hearing loss – Often progressive in older adults, leading to difficulties in communication.', "Alzheimer's disease – A form of dementia characterized by memory loss and cognitive decline.", 'Urinary incontinence – Involuntary leakage of urine that can be due to weakened pelvic muscles or nerve issues.', 'Presbyopia – Age-related difficulty in focusing on close objects, requiring reading glasses', 'Sarcopenia – Loss of skeletal muscle mass and strength associated with aging.', 'Type 2 diabetes – A metabolic disorder that becomes more common as people age due to lifestyle factors and decreased insulin sensitivity.', 'Depression – Older adults can experience depression, which may be linked to social isolation or health issues.', "Cataracts – A clouding of the eye's lens that affects vision and is more common in older individuals.", "Dementia – A general term for a decline in mental ability severe enough to interfere with daily life, not limited to Alzheimer's disease.", "Parkinson's disease – A progressive nervous system disorder that affects movement and can occur later in life.", 'Osteoarthritis – A degenerative joint disease that leads to the breakdown of cartilage and bone changes, causing pain and stiffness.', 'Chronic obstructive pulmone']
